description: Try our easy to follow Easter Bunny Chocolate Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easter Bunny Chocolate Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare cake mix according to packet directions. Bake as directed. When cooled, slice cake in half, spread frosting sachet on bottom layer and scatter half the mini smarties over frosting. Cover with top half.

Snip 2 sides of a marshmallow, on an angle, to create bunny ears. Make a slit across the tops of whole marshmallows and stick the ears in the slits. Press to secure. Use writing icing to secure smarties for the noses, and decorate faces.
Spread frosting tub all over cake, and decorate top with bunnies. Create more ears with remaining marshmallows. Press ears and remaining mini smarties around the sides of the cake.
